$comment: OSCAL System Security Plan (SSP) Format: JSON Schema

system-characteristics.title: System Characteristics
system-characteristics.description: Contains the characteristics of the system, such as its name, purpose, and security impact level.

description.title: Description
description.description: A free-text description of the system.

system-information.title: System Information
system-information.description: Contains details about all types of information stored, processed, or transmitted by the system, such as privacy information, and NIST 800-60 information types.

designations.title: System Information Designations
designations.description: Used to enumerate all special information type designations that may be required by a specific organization or compliance regiem, such as privacy impact information (PII), or payment card information (PCI).

designation.title: System Information Designation
designation.description: Used when a specific organization or compliance regiem requires certain information types to be explicitly cited, such as privacy impact information (PII), or payment card information (PCI).

declaration.title: Declaration
declaration.description: Identifies whether a specific designation applies to this system.

qualifiers.title: Information Designation Qualifiers
qualifiers.description: A list of questions about the system that contribute to the establishment of a designation, such as the FedRAMP privacy threshold analysis questions.

qualifier.title: Individual Information Designation Qualifier
qualifier.description: An individual questions about the system that contributes to the establishment of a designation, such as a FedRAMP privacy threshold analysis question.

qual-question.title: Qualifier Question
qual-question.description: A question that must be answered about this system.

qual-notes.title: Qualifier Question Response Notes
qual-notes.description: Additional information about the response to the question.

information-type.title: Information Type
information-type.description: Contains details about one type of information stored, processed, or transmitted by the system, such as privacy information, and NIST 800-60 information types.

base.title: Base Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
base.description: The prescribed base (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

selected.title: Selected Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
selected.description: The selected (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

adjustment-justification.title: Adjustment Justification
adjustment-justification.description: If the selected security level is different from the base security level, this contains the justificaiton for the change.

leveraged-authorizations.title: Leveraged Authorizations
leveraged-authorizations.description: All leveraged authorizations for this system.

leveraged-authorization.title: Leveraged Authorization
leveraged-authorization.description: The details for a single leveraged authorization

leveraged-authorization-service-provider.title: Leveraged System Service Provider Name
leveraged-authorization-service-provider.description: Name of the service provider that manages the leveraged system.

leveraged-authorization-date-granted.title: Leveraged System Authorization Date
leveraged-authorization-date-granted.description: The date the leveraged system received its authorization.

role.title: Role
role.description: Defining a role to be assigned to a party or agent

privilege.title: Privilege
privilege.description: Identifies the type/level of system privilege for the role. For FedRAMP, the only valid values are "p" (Privileged), "np" (Non-Privileged), or "nla" (No Logical Access).

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: Identifies the functions performed by the user role.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Provides a collection of statistics about users of the system.

system-implementation.title: System Implementation
system-implementation.description: Provides information as to how the system is implemented.

ports-protocols-services.title: Ports, Protocols, and Services
ports-protocols-services.description: A collection of the ports, protocols, and services used within the system.

service.title: Service
service.description: A collection of information about an individual service within the system.

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.description: Information about the protocol used to provide a service.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: Describes the purpose for the service within the system.

used-by.title: Used By
used-by.description: Identifies the types of system component that uses the service. One entry per

interconnection.title: Interconnection
interconnection.description: Details on an individual system interconnection.

isa-authorization.title: ISA Authorization
isa-authorization.description: Name of the individual who authorized the Interconnection Security Agreement (ISA).

isa-name.title: ISA Name
isa-name.description: Title of the Interconnection Security Agreement (ISA).

isa-date.title: ISA Date
isa-date.description: Date of the Interconnection Security Agreement (ISA).

characteristics.title: Characteristics
characteristics.description: Component characteristics, assets and configuration information

ip-address.title: Internet Protocol Address
ip-address.description: Use the @type flag to deisgnate IPv4 or IPv6.

satisfaction.title: Satisfaction
satisfaction.description: Describes how the indicated control is satisfied by this component

dns-name.title: Network Name
dns-name.description: If available, state the DNS name or URL of the inventory item. This can be left blank if one does not exist, or it is a dynamic field.

netbios-name.title: NetBIOS Name
netbios-name.description: If available, state the NetBIOS name of the inventory item. This can be omitted if one does not exist, or it is a dynamic field.

mac-address.title: Media Access Control (MAC) Address
mac-address.description: If available, state the MAC Address of the inventory item. This can be left blank if one does not exist, or it is a dynamic field.

location.title: Location of the Asset
location.description: Physical location of hardware. Could include Data Center ID, Cage#, Rack# or other meaningful location identifiers.

asset-type.title: Asset Type
asset-type.description: Simple description of the asset's function (e.g., Router, Storage Array, DNS Server, etc.) Do not use vendor or product names here.

authenticated-scan.title: Authenticated Scan
authenticated-scan.description: Indicate whether this asset is planned for authenticated scanning.

comments.title: Comments
comments.description: Any additional information that could be useful to an auditor or reviewer.

serial-no.title: Serial Number
serial-no.description: Product serial number or internal asset tag number.

asset-owner.title: Asset Owner
asset-owner.description: The individual, title, or role who "owns" the asset on behalf of the organization.

asset-administrator.title: Asset Administrator
asset-administrator.description: The individual, title, role, or team responsible for operating and maintaining the asset.

control.title: Control Implementation
control.description: Information related to the implementation of an individual control.

set-param.title: Set Parameter Value
set-param.description: Identifies the parameter that will be filled in by the enclosed value element.

value.title: Value
value.description: The phrase or string that fills-in the parameter and completes the requirement statement.

control-response.title: Control Response
control-response.description: Describes how a control is implemented.

ref.title: Reference
ref.description: A reference, with one or more citations to standards, related documents, or other resources

link.title: Link
link.description: A line or paragraph with a hypertext link

metadata.title: Publication metadata
metadata.description: Information describing the publication or availability of this document

title.title: Title
title.description: The title under which this document is formally published

doc-id.title: Document Identifier
doc-id.description: Any sort of document identifier, name, code, path or other indicator of where and how this document may be located, compared or validated. Given appropriate qualification via its type and rel, this value may point to the same or another version of the document.

prop.title: Property
prop.description: A property associated with the document

party.title: Party (organization or person)
party.description: A responsible entity, either singular (an organization or person) or collective (multiple persons)

org.title: Organization
org.description: An organization or legal entity (not a person), with contact information

person-id.title: Personal Identifier
person-id.description: An identifier for a person (such as an ORCID) using a designated scheme.

org-id.title: Organization Identifier
org-id.description: An identifier for an organization using a designated scheme.

hlink.title: Hashed link
hlink.description: A pointer to an external document with optional hash for verification

short-name.title: short-name
short-name.description: A common name, short name or acronym

addr-line.title: Address line
addr-line.description: A single line of an address

city.title: City
city.description: City, town or geographical region for mailing address

state.title: State
state.description: State, province or analogous geographical region for mailing address

postal-code.title: Postal Code
postal-code.description: Postal or ZIP code for mailing address

url.title: URL
url.description: URL for web site or Internet presence

resource.title: Resource
resource.description: A resource to inform or authenticate the present document.

hash.title: Hash
hash.description: A document hash or other value subject to cryptographic authentication

meta.title: Metadata field value
meta.description: Any customized or specialized metadata value.

import.title: Import resource
import.description: Makes information from an external component file available to this component file.

include.title: Include controls
include.description: Specifies which controls and subcontrols to include from the resource (source catalog) being imported

all.title: Include all
all.description: Include all controls from the imported resource (catalog)

call.title: Call
call.description: The call element imports the component definition identified by the @component-id attribute in the external component file.
